Package public_transportation.water

Class Ferry

java.lang.Object
public_transportation.PublicTransportation
public_transportation.water.Ferry
public class Ferry
extends PublicTransportation
The Ferry class is a sub-class of PublicTransportation. It represents public transportation on water. It contains the buildYear and shipName.

    • Ferry

      Default constructor of Ferry class.

    • Ferry

      public Ferry​(double ticketPrice, int numberOfStops, int buildYear, java.lang.String shipName)
      Parameterized constructor of Ferry class.
      Parameters:
      ticketPrice - Ticket price is the price of a single ticket to use to embark in the Ferry.
      numberOfStops - The number of stops the Ferry has to stop to.
      buildYear - The year the Ferry was built.
      shipName - The name of the ship.

      Parameters:
